author: Staff Reporter
text:
There was tension on the District Police Office (DPO) premises on Friday after a 68-year-old woman and her son attempted self-immolation over a land dispute with their neighbour.

Dhanam and her son Giriraj (43) of Athiyur attempted to commit suicide alleging that police did not act properly on their complaint against their neighbour.

The suicide bid created flutter on the campus.
title: Woman, son attempt suicide
